General.Name: Praram 9 Hospital Public Company Limited
General.Description: Praram 9 Hospital Public Company Limited operates a hospital under the Praram 9 Hospital name in Thailand. The company operates medicine, surgery, diabetes and metabolic, spine, neurology, thyroid and thyroid surgery, obstetrics gynecology, IVF, oncocare, emergency, imaging, LASIK, skin and cosmetic laser surgery, mind, gastroenterology and hepatobiliary, dental, check-up, eye, pediatric, sleep, ear, nose, and throat centers, as well as breast, and vaccination and travel medicine clinics. It is also involved in the operation of kidney disease and transplantation, cardiovascular, and pain management and wellness institutes. Praram 9 Hospital Public Company Limited was founded in 1992 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
